oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General System theory, Like-Quantum Semantics and Fuzzy Sets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Licata, Ignazio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - General Physics
Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is outlined the possibility to extend the quantum formalism in relation to the requirements of the general systems theory. It can be done by using a quantum semantics arising from the deep logical structure of quantum theory. It is so possible taking into account the logical openness relationship between observer and system. We are going to show how considering the truth-values of quantum propositions within the context of the fuzzy sets is here more useful for systemics . In conclusion we propose an example of formal quantum coherence.
